Hello {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c")}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team Five Star Professional is pleased to remind you that {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_Last_Name__c} is a {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} winner of our {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} award in the {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c} area.
At Five Star Professional, we conduct market research to define and promote professional excellence in regional markets across the United States. Five Star Professional Award Winners are measured using an objective, in-depth research methodology with significant focus on customer feedback and overall satisfaction.
For more information on this award and {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_Last_Name__c}, check out this video post! Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
